channel.title: How do i change the way the npc talk in my server?
channel.description: i downloaded a files and it said go to their forum and i don't want them to say that i want them to say go to stupidkelog.omgforum.net and when the way u log in it said server called by some other dude how do i change that?

item.title: How do i change the way the npc talk in my server?
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

If you want to change what NPC’s say then open NPCHandler.java and search for their message. So if a NPC would say “Hey whats up dud” I would search hey whats up dud in NPCHandler.java. Once you find it, you can change what the NPC says…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the way the npc talk in my server?
